thread.title: Arkansas basketball team to hold open practice before Razorbacks-Auburn football game
thread.title_full: Arkansas basketball team to hold open practice before Razorbacks-Auburn football game

title: Arkansas basketball team to hold open practice before Razorbacks-Auburn football game
text:
Arkansas basketball team to hold open practice before Razorbacks-Auburn football game THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   4:28 pmLast   4:28 pm   
Organizations: 
Arkansas (508) 
FAYETTEVILLE, Arkansas â€” The University of Arkansas basketball team has scheduled an open practice to give fans a chance to see the team before the Arkansas-Auburn football game. 
The practice will be Oct. 24 in Bud Walton Arena from 8:30 a.m. until 10 a.m. Normal football parking permits will apply and the only entrance to Bud Walton Arena will the south doors. 
The Razorbacks take on Auburn starting at 11 a.m. at Donald W. Reynolds Razorback Stadium.
